summary: Two teenage girls in small-town Sweden. Elin is beautiful, popular, and bored with life. Agnes is friendless, sad, and secretly in love with Elin.
cast: Alexandra Dahlström|Rebecka Liljeberg|Erica Carlson|Mathias Rust|Stefan Hörberg|Josefine Nyberg|Ralph Carlsson|Maria Hedborg|Axel Widegren|Jill Ung|Lisa Skagerstam|Lina Svantesson|Johanna Larsson|Elinor Johansson|Jessica Melkersson|Bo Lyckman|Daniel Teider|Nils Björkman|Per Larsén|Kenneth Larsson|Karl Strandlind|Peter Teider|Linda Malmqvist|Christer Almar|Michael Andersson|Therése Andreasson|Rialda Arifovic|Sanella Arifovic|Fredrik Arrelid|Vanessa Babot|Joséphine Bordi|Sandra Boström|Betty Carlsson|Alain Carlstein|Elias Chamoun|Maikel Chamoun|John Ole Dahl-Olsen|Dlawer Dalawe|Mikaela Eklund|Elin Fransson|Kim Fransson|Fredrik Gunnarsson|Lina Gustafsson|Susanna Gustafsson|Grazyna Göransson|Peter Hildingsson|Malin Hultgren|Max Hylander|Carolina Johansson|Niklas Johansson|Petra Johansson|Daniel Karlsson|Linda Karlsson|Andreas Kvist|Mårten Lauvall|Jonas Lenberg|Josephine Lewing|Carl-Johan Lext|Jonas Lindell|Robert Lindqvist|Frida Lundby|Jonas Lönn|Anton Löwek|Rebecka Martikainen|Emma Massey|Andreas Mattson|Daniel Mattson|Modar Mohanna|Elisabet Nilebäck|Mikael Nordman|Martin Nyholm|Petra Nyman|Joakim Olofsson|Kalle Rosborg|Vlora Shabani|Martin Storåsen|Johanna Ström|Jonna Sundqvist|Patrik Ström|Boyar Syla|Linda Syla|Magnus Thell|Gustav Tågne|Sofia Wennberg|Tobias Andersson
title: Fucking Åmål
